service.query: SELECT M.PNAME1 AS NAME, M.URL AS URL, M.SCODE AS SCODE FROM COM.TC_PGMMST M , COM.TC_PGMSMENU S WHERE M.SCODE = S.SCODE -- AND M.USE_YN = 'Y' AND S.LCODE= ? -- AND PID NOT IN ('EORD105', 'EORD107', 'ECMN105') AND PID NOT IN ('EORD105', 'EORD107') ORDER BY S.SEQ

SELECT M.PNAME1 AS NAME, M.URL AS URL, M.SCODE AS SCODE FROM COM.TC_PGMMST M , COM.TC_PGMSMENU S WHERE M.SCODE = S.SCODE AND M.USE_YN = 'Y' AND S.LCODE = (CASE WHEN ? = '99999' THEN 'EORD' ELSE 'ECMN' END) AND PID IN ('EORD105', 'EORD107', 'ECMN105') ORDER BY S.SEQ
